name: 薛文景
objective: 本課程在討論金屬性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
schedule:
週次
1-2 　　Titanium alloy
3-4.　　Alkaline Phosphatase  Activity
5-6　　Bovine Serum Albumin
7　　Surface Profilometry
8　　Cell proliferation and differentiation
9　　Enzymatical Determination
10-11　　Human bone marrow
12 XPS Quantitative Analysis
13-15  Explain why the cell attachment and proliferation are related to the surface roughness of implanted titanium alloy?
 How did the Stern-Geary equation via corrosion current density ic relate to the Nyquist plot for the Randles circuit-charge transfer control?
16 期末考
